sentences.english: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅卻殘害教會，進各人的家，拉着男女下在監裏。

sentences.english: '" Then David crept up unnoticed and cut off a corner of Saul's robe.
sentences.chinese: 大衛就起來，悄悄地割下掃羅外袍的衣襟。

sentences.english: And it was told Saul, saying, Behold, David is at Naioth in Ramah.
sentences.chinese: 有人告訴掃羅，說大衛在拉瑪的拿約。

sentences.english: Samuel was asked by God to anoint Saul and later David as Kings of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 神吩咐撒母耳膏掃羅和大衛爲以色列的王。

sentences.english: Now the Spirit of the LORD had departed from Saul, and an evil spirit from the LORD tormented him.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的靈離開掃羅，有惡魔從耶和華那裏來擾亂他。

sentences.english: What is your opinion about David who gave up the chances to kill Saul?
sentences.chinese: 大衛有機會殺害掃羅卻不忍下手，你對此有何看法？

sentences.english: And Saul perceived that it was Samuel, and he stooped with his face to the ground, and bowed himself.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅知道是撒母耳，就屈身，臉伏於地下拜。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the witnesses laid their clothes at the feet of a young man named Saul.
sentences.chinese: 作見證的人，把衣裳放在一個少年人名叫掃羅的腳前。

sentences.english: He was prophesying in his house, while David was playing the harp, as he usually did. Saul had a spear in his hand
sentences.chinese: 大衛照常彈琴，掃羅手裏拿着槍。

sentences.english: Wherefore they say, Is Saul also among the prophets?
sentences.chinese: 因此有句俗語說，掃羅也列在先知中嗎。

sentences.english: Saul had his spear in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 大衛照常彈琴，掃羅手裏拿著槍。

sentences.english: First with Jonathan, and now with Michal, Saul starts to lose his own family members.
sentences.chinese: 先是約拿單然後是米甲，掃羅開始失去他親人的信任。

sentences.english: Then David crept up unnoticed and cut off a corner of Saul's robe.
sentences.chinese: 大衛就起來，悄悄地割下掃羅外袍的衣襟。

sentences.english: Saul had no heart towards God.
When Saul heard this, he went into the Desert of Maon in pursuit of David.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅聽見，便在瑪雲的曠野追趕大衛。

sentences.english: He came to the sheep pens along the way; a cave was there, and Saul went in to relieve himself.
sentences.chinese: 到了路旁的羊圈，在那裏有洞，掃羅進去大解。
